# Introduction

Welcome to **ReliaShiny!** ReliaShiny is an interactive web application for reliability analysis. It is designed to be user-friendly and accessible to both beginners and experienced practitioners in the field of reliability engineering.

# Getting Started 

To install ReliaShiny in R:

```{r, eval=FALSE}
install.packages("ReliaShiny")
```

To install the development version:

```{r, eval=FALSE}
devtools::install_github("paulgovan/ReliaShiny")
```

To launch the app: 

```{r, eval=FALSE}
ReliaShiny::ReliaShiny()
```

![](https://github.com/paulgovan/ReliaShiny/blob/master/inst/images/Landing.png?raw=true){width=100%}

Or to access the app through a browser, visit [govan.shinyapps.io/reliashiny/](https://govan.shinyapps.io/reliashiny/).
